title: LTE Instability on Pixel 2 after December Final Update
content:
My LTE connection on my Pixel 2 has been unstable since the final December update.  It usually settles on H+ and sometimes goes to 3G. I can only get LTE after removing the SIM card and reinserting.  It lasts for a few minutes, seemingly until I change what screen I'm looking at on my phone.

It will even tell me I don't have data when it shows that I am connected to H+.

Sending media through MMS is practically impossible.

I have T-Mobile for service and my phone was purchased unlocked from the Google Store.

I've tried:
APN settings
Reseating the SIM card
Swapping SIM cards w/ another phone on my account
Resetting network settings
Clearing data and cache from phone services
Factory reset

Thank you for any help.
